item.title: Certified Secure Software Lifecycle Professional (CSSLP) Notes
item.description: TOC https://www.isc2.org/Certifications/CSSLP This is a collection of notes I’ve taken for the CSSLP. Hopefully they are useful to you as well! I made a program to study for this test. Feel free to use it. https://github.com/HenryFBP/pyconsolequiz This will become a table of contents. Don’t touch! {:toc} Secure Software Concepts Core Concepts Main concept is about restricting user access Confidentiality Keep info away from people who don’t NEED to know it
